Docs.summary: The TagLib.Flac namespace contains classes for reading and writing tag information for FLAC files. These files are common for people trying to backup their music collection as they retain 100% of the original CD data in about half the space.
Docs.remarks: As of the current version of TagLib#, support is only included for metadata stored in the Vorbis Comments, ID3v2, and ID3v1 formats.
